description: --- tags: - translation license: apache-2.0 --- ### opus-mt-it-en * source languages: it * target languages: en * OPUS readme: it-en * dataset: opus * model: transformer-align * pre-processing: normalization + SentencePiece * download original weights: opus-2019-12-18.zip * test set translations: opus-2019-12-18.test.txt * test set scores: opus-2019-12-18.eval.txt ## Benchmarks | testset | BLEU | chr-F | |-----------------------|-------|-------| | newssyscomb2009.it.en | 35.3 | 0.600 | | newstest2009.it.en | 34.0 | 0.594 | | Tatoeba.it.en | 70.9 | 0.808 |
model_explanation_gemini: Translates text from Italian to English using a transformer-based model trained on OPUS datasets.
